title: Links open new window instead of a new tab. Prefs are set correctly. Currently have 22-23 open windows and over 1/2 have single tabs.
content: For weeks my Firefox on my 2011 iMac 27 running High Sierra is opening a new window instead of opening a new tab automatically. If I right click on a link I can force it to open a new tab. My screen is full of 22 windows! I now have to copy the single tab in the new window and paste it in a new tab and then close the new window. Firefox has always been reliable on my iMac...until now. My OS is High Sierra running 32 bit programs only.
creator: andyhutch1947

title: No sound on Linux
content:
I am on Linux. I get no sound from any video.

Simply going to youtube and then playing a video produces no sound.
creator: thom11

title: Top bar changes size when clicking on the top panel in Mac
content: Since version 99, the top bar of Firefox behaves weirdly. As soon as I press on a dialog in the top panel of the Mac surface, the top bar increases as shown in the image. Only restarting Firefox resets it to the original look. Do you know the cause of this?
creator: jufu229

title: Trouble with ifram src (local HTML)
content: In my code if have <iframe src="https://www.247klondike.com/klondikeSolitaire3card.php" ></iframe> It as being treated as a relative address instead of an absolute address, other browsers have no problem with it. I et message "Firefox can’t find the file at /C:/Howard/HTML/www.247klondike.com/klondikeSolitaire3card.php.". If it makes any difference, the HTML is from my computer, not a web site.
creator: howardcarymorris2

title: Downloading & opening .zip files
content:
How does one specify which program opens a .zip file after it is downloaded?

Presently, the download functions properly, but when I click on the file, VLC media player opens; have no idea why; how can I specify 7-zip File Manager instead?

Thank you. Appreciate.
creator: Hikermann

title: Firefox in Linux no longer has the option to show title bar?
content:
Upgrading my Linux install to a current version, and in so doing, discovered newer versions of both Firefox and Thunderbird totally disregard title bars and other window decorations. As I run Fluxbox, those are kinda necessary, and the browser and email client both lack essential elements like a close button without them. Many, MANY suggestions to check the "Customize..." but, that doesn't seem to exist in 101? What exists instead is "Customize Toolbar...", which does not have the little checkbox in the lower left corner to re-enable the title bar.

Any suggestions?
creator: baphijmm

title: Firefox lakkasi toimimasta
content:
Firefox lakkasi toimimasta viime viikolla, ei saa yhteyttä nettiin. asetusvalikot ym ei avaudu. Avautuu vain tyhjä selain. Ei anna mitään virheilmoitusta. Läppärissä on F-Securen Internet Security, siellä ei näytä olevan estoja firefoxille Window Defenderin palomuuri ohjelmastakaan en löydä mitään estoja Firefoxille.

Muut selaimet toimii, Crome ja Edge

Olen ladannut firefoxin uudelleen parikin kertaa. Käytössä on win 10 x64 Firefox versio näyttäs olevan 101

Kyllähän muillakin selaimilla voi surffailla, mutta kun Firefox olis paras
creator: reima.mukkala

title: Can't sync firefox custom preferences
content:
I know there's [[an article|https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/sync-custom-preferences#w_sync-custom-preferences]] on how to sync custom preferences. I wanted to sync my toolbar customizations and some other preferences like disabling disk caching. And I don't even have other firefox instances, instead I just want to sync only on one device, so that I can continue the same setup when I signin later on the same device.

I've tried to add services.sync.prefs.sync.browser.uiCustomization.state, "services.sync.prefs.sync.browser.cache.disk.enable" and set it to true. But it doesn't work. What am I missing? No one seems to address this. May I am missing something.
creator: pcoop

title: printing issue
content: Every time I try to print any document in Firefox, it prints much smaller than what the preview shows. I have changed margin settings and tried changing the sizing vs 'fit to window', but it still prints smaller than what is showing it will print. if i choose to print in the system dialogue or on another browser its fine. just the firefox print system is not correct. Cannot find an answer anywhere
creator: kayciekat

title: nothing show up not even setting page nothing load just a grey box
content: was working fine, closed it by mistake and when i reopen nothing work... tried refresh, complete uninstall computer restart... nvidia driver update... i did everything i could think or find on web (using chrome cause its working there) i have internet on computer, no firewall...
creator: berard.philippe

title: Firefox exits immediately after opening, no other parts of the program work
content:
Whenever I try to open firefox, a blank screen opens, then immediately closes. I have tried reinstalling firefox, as well as deleting my user profile and restarting my computer. if I try to open the program in safe mode, the same thing happens. If I try to run the profile manager, it will immediately close as well. I do not have an antivirus installed potentially blocking it, and I have let it through the windows firewall. I never get a crash report window or an error message.

I am running windows 10 and installed both firefox and the installer freshly today. I have not previously gotten it to work on this PC

title: Some logins blocked
content: Since upgrading to 101 I am unable to login to some websites. So far this has happened with two financial institutions. For these I have had to use another browser to login to them. What happens is that I fill in my login credentials and click the login button. The login button appears to be dead as nothing happens. Logging in to all other websites works fine.
creator: bruce103

title: Reinstalling Firefox and linking to an existing account
content:
My desktop computer had a meltdown requiring a new hard drive and re-installation of Firefox. Upon installation I was asked for an authentication code but I have never put the two step process in place.

I'm then asked for a 10 digit number provided when setting up my account. I set my account up multiple years ago and have an alpha numeric code which does not work.

I can still access my account on my laptop - just cant reinstall on my desktop.

OS - Windows 10 - up to date, downloaded yesterday. Same with Firefox.

Suggestions?
creator: karengrogan7
